# Savoring Pre-Departure Lunch at Haneda Airport

Haneda Airport, conveniently accessible from central Tokyo, boasts a wide array of excellent restaurants for both domestic and international travelers, allowing you to make the most of your time before departure. We're excited to introduce you to some fantastic spots where you can enjoy a delicious Japanese lunch before your flight. Indulge in authentic Japanese flavors before you embark on your journey!

## Traditional Eel Specialty Restaurant

<Place id="ChIJ5xO4biNhGGARopYr2cD-9TA" />
Located in Haneda Airport Garden, Yondaime Kikukawa is a long-established specialty restaurant dedicated to eel. Their eel, grilled with a secret sauce, is wonderfully plump and fragrant, pairing perfectly with rice. Enjoy authentic eel dishes like unaju (eel served over rice in a lacquered box) or unadon (eel bowl) before your flight. This unique Haneda Airport lunch spot allows you to savor a traditional Japanese flavor experience, making for a truly special start to your journey.

## Authentic Hand-Pulled Udon

<Place id="ChIJE7xNnlFhGGARRzTzzO9qa2I" />
Also found in Haneda Airport Garden is Hanayama Udon. This renowned restaurant from Gunma prefecture has brought its authentic hand-pulled udon to the airport. Their wonderfully firm udon noodles and rich dashi broth are simply exquisite. During lunchtime, you'll find a wide array of satisfying options, including tempura and niku udon (udon with meat). It's the perfect choice for anyone looking to enjoy a hearty and authentic Japanese meal before their flight.

## Premium Japanese Pork Cutlet Specialty Shop

<Place id="ChIJrXh_oVFhGGAR9Nw2ZTqzyHE" />
Head over to Terminal 3 for Waton Katsu Sen. This popular spot uses carefully selected Japanese pork, creating tonkatsu with a perfectly crispy coating that truly enhances the meat's delicious umami. Their lunch sets are incredibly satisfying, complete with rice, miso soup, and shredded cabbage. It's the ideal meal to energize yourself before your flight. For an authentic and delicious tonkatsu lunch at Haneda Airport, this is the place to be.

## Enjoy a Fulfilling Lunch Experience at Haneda Airport

From a traditional eel specialty restaurant to authentic hand-pulled udon and premium Japanese pork cutlets, Haneda Airport offers a fantastic selection of genuine lunch spots that you can enjoy even with limited time before your flight. Why not treat yourself to a delicious Japanese lunch and make the most of those precious moments before your journey?
